desc: Welcome to Koala Bambino the home of the UK's first 100% Organic Eucalyptus baby essentials. Our baby swaddle blankets and cot sheets are more sustainable than cotton and bamboo. They are durable, delicate and softer too! I hope you both enjoy!

layout.text: Soft & sustainable organic eucalyptus baby essentials. Crafted for babies, designed by mums. Superior to cotton and bamboo.
